name: IT BELONGS TO THEM
description:
LOCATE ALL 8 ARTIFACTS. MEET THEM.

IT BELONGS TO THEM is a short horror experience made in 48 hours for the GMTK2020 gamejam. Take pictures of all 8 artifacts to get the real ending.

Controls:

Mouse - Move Camera

WASD - Change between cameras

Z - Toggle zoom

Left Click - Take Picture

btw, your game didn't crash, it just ends like that ;)
